lead_paragraph: The champion Carolina Hurricanes signed center Eric Staal to a three-year, $13.5 million contract. The deal was announced within an hour of Staal's becoming a restricted free agent. Staal, 21, earned $942,400 last season, when he led the team in scoring with 100 regular-season points and led all players in the postseason with 28 points.
